page.title: 13WESTON HOSPITAL
page.content: In{WESTON HOSPITAL}there are{152} patients of all ages.The majority of patients are old people.{WESTON {HOSPITAL}looks after people who are mentally handicapped.There are{150 staff of which there are{100}nurses and{50}others.If the patients have nobody else to look after them they will stay there for their whole life. At{WESTON HOSPITAL}they train them to do things they need to do.Soon the hospital is hoping to lose some beds because the people will be going to other places within the local community. The{HOSPITAL}is financed by{CENTRAL {GOVERNMENT}funds of over{Â£1,000,000}a year.If money were no object the hospital would like to modernise the buildings.
